703043f-a.text: Atlantic Avenue, north side, from and including Clermont Avenue, to, but not including Adelphi Street. The view also shows Clermont Avenue, west side, from and including Atlantic Avenue, to, but not including Fulton Street. This is a view of an old Brooklyn neighborhood. Frame houses may be seen at 510-512 Clermont Avenue, and in the background, the Fulton Street Elevated Lines. November 26, 1927. P. L. Sperr.
703043f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clermont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
